thread.title: Muizenberg train fire arson case opened
thread.title_full: Muizenberg train fire arson case opened | News24

author: news24.com
title: Muizenberg train fire arson case opened
text:
Cape Town- Police are investigating a case of arson following a train fire at Muizenberg station on Thursday night.
"Three minors have been arrested and were subsequently released to the custody of their parents," Metrorail spokesperson Riana Scott said on Friday.
However, Western Cape police spokesperson Lt Col Andre Traut said no-one had been arrested as yet.
“The circumstances are being investigated and an arson case has been registered,” he said.
